text: hey everyone we're very excited to
announce our first group trip
come join us for eight days this
November 10th to 18th to travel across
the northern parts of Thailand or
precisely this route this trip is for
people who want to a hangout and explore
the hidden parts of Thailand to them and
most importantly be to learn how to earn
money online to afford your travel there
will be a heavy focus on making and
monetizing travel videos but I will also
be sharing advice for starting the
travel vlogs working with brands
marketing getting sponsorships pitching
and more basically I will be spilling
all my best tips and secrets I've
learned over the last 6 years into these
eight days the trip will be powered by
my friends at G adventures but the
schedule will be customized to make room
for shooting videos and editing slots
learning in the evening you can look at
this as an opportunity to pick my brain
for eight days and join us on the trip
of a lifetime but keep in mind that this
trip will be as much learning behind our
computers as it will be fun traveling an
average day of this trip will be waking
up early exploring a village meeting
with local
learning how to cook their foods and
building everything again and then we
will spend three to four hours every
night in a cafe or hotel lobby with our
computers open and ready to learn I will
have various lessons plan to teach but
it will be very flexible there are three
major requirements to qualify for this
trip number one you must be 18 to 35
years old and be able to speak English
number two you need to have a desire to
learn how to make travel videos start a
blog or a career as a digital nomad
making money online number three you
need to have some kind of camera that is
more advanced than an iPhone you also
need to have a computer but you don't
need any previous filmmaking skills
there are 12 spots open for this trip to
apply simply send me a 60 to 90 second
draw a video of you explaining who you
are why you want to come and what you
are planning to get out of this trip
please don't go over 90 seconds or your
application may be skipped and that's it
if selected you will hear back from us
within one month and don't worry if
you're not selected this time because we
may shortlist you for our next group
trip in early 2019 you can find more
information in my blog post linked below
such as a more detailed schedule of our
trip and total costs since payment must
be made 90 days before the trip starts
that gives us only two months to go
through your applications good luck
applying and we can't wait to travel
with you I'm drew pinsky and if you like
my travel videos please click Subscribe
and join me as I plan to visit every
country in the world
